body_html: ACT only requires a while_loop inside the rnncell, not a scan, and does not require TensorArray except in the outer dynamic_rnn call. You should be able to implement it without running into this bug.
body_text: ACT only requires a while_loop inside the rnncell, not a scan, and does not require TensorArray except in the outer dynamic_rnn call. You should be able to implement it without running into this bug.
body: ACT only requires a while_loop inside the rnncell, not a scan, and does not require TensorArray except in the outer dynamic_rnn call. You should be able to implement it without running into this bug.
